commitResults.messageTitle: Bump Blueprint; remove obsolete hotfixes, deprecations (#2773)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Bump minimum Blueprint version

Done to allow compatibility with new React 18 `createRoot`.

* Migrate from deprecated `Tooltip2`, `Popover2`

Done partially so far, with the full migration in a subsequent commit.

* Migrate more components to fix deprecations

* Update test snapshots

* Migrate remaining components to fix deprecations

* Remove deprecated package from `requireProvider`

This would necessitate a corresponding change in modules to ensure they
don't import the deprecated package, or simply just mark it as
non-external.

* Remove `@blueprintjs/popover2` package completely

* Fix format

* Fix format

* Reformat files post-merge

* Bump Blueprint version

* Use BP `Classes` utility instead of raw strings

Prevents regressions when the CSS namespace changes in the meantime
while we still have yet to migrate away fully from the CSS API.

* Fix lint

* Migrate to new notifications API

Removes the old hotfix now that Blueprint supports it.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix double window prompt when uploading users (#2943)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Fix double window prompt when uploading users

Previously, two window prompts were shown when uploading a csv file.
The first window was caused by the rootProps from the CSVReader
component. The second window was caused by the FileInput's input
element.

Let's fix this by replacing the FileInput component with something that
looks similar to it.

commitResults.messageTitle: Transfer pagination work from frontend to backend (#2787)
commitResults.messageBody:
* hello world.

* Y this so hard

* commit test: remove junk text files

* changed pagination index from +1 to +12345 to explore consequences

* prototype page query parameter upon right arrow click. TODO: clean up query appending method.

* page querying and loading proof of concept

* Now accepts page query when loading, albeit naively

* now adds query based on view.

* renamed frontend query parameters to index to avoid confusion with backend querying

* Sanity check: hardcoded offset / pageSize values to verify redux.

* Redux action updated to channel page query to backend

* Input validation for page querying

* Now also accepts pageSize query

* mapped button to dispatch (WIP - very bad UI now.)

* now with slightly more passable UI =D

* neutralized innate pagination of tanstack.

* i bow down to the redux spaghetti

* remove URL querying

* dispatch moved into page, prop passed into component now

* table now uses zero-indexed pagination, and converts page to offset before dispatching

* Test query builder - do not pull this commit

* Filtering for name and type (Proof of concept)

* State dispatch modified to utilize backend response format changes

* table columns and Filterable now included within the GradingSubmissionsTable component to allow for page reset upon application of filter

* simple list selection for pageSize.

* Filtering for student name and student username transferred to backend

* Unused tanstack pagination has been removed, as backend filters ensure only 1 page's worth of entries.

* Separation of concerns test commit

* SubmissionStatus now runs on backend filtering. Remaining: GroupName (OK), GradingStatus (tougher)

* Refactored filter parameters from Gradings page into Grading Submission Table to use as filtering parameters.

* Frontend filtering for graded status removed. (BUG: False positives)

* Removees prop passing for Filterable to take advantage of its nested state within GradingSubmissionTable. Filterable is nested so that it can update the pagination state and share a common callback function.

* Swapped underlying boolean values for group filtering to filter only by group when set to true, matching original definition

* Fix format

* Remove commented code

* Use dependency injection for Filterable

Prevents the unnecessary nesting of components and optimizes rendering
performance as the Filterable component does not need to be recreated.

* Revert unintended changes

* Fix incorrect merge resolution
* Reorder lines to optimize diff readability
* Revert unintended ESLint changes

* Use destructuring for simplicity

* Use type alias for GradingOverviews

To support further refactoring.

* Fix incorrect typing

* Remove extra whitespace

* Fix tests

* Use new type alias in test file

This was missed during the initial refactor.

* Now includes backend filtering by group name. All backend filters implemented except grading status.

* Fixed bug where filtering did not reset page.

* Updated correct page options.

* formatting

* Update GradingSubmissionsTable.tsx

missed out one dropdown in prev bugix

* Update EnvVisualizer.tsx.snap

revert unintended changes

* Update EnvVisualizer.tsx.snap

revert unintended changes

* Smarter derived state usage with useMemo

* fixed infinite re-rendering.

* linting

* Move columns outside component again

Uses dependency injection and memoization to prevent unnecessary
recreations of expensive objects.

* Remove unnecessary type arguments

* Reorder lines

Optimizes diff readability.

* memoized getGradingOverviewsCallback

* revert

* PR comment 1: overviews callback function now memoized

* Update src/pages/academy/grading/subcomponents/GradingSubmissionsTable.tsx

Co-authored-by: Richard Dominick <34370238+RichDom2185@users.noreply.github.com>

* PR Comment 2: derived maxPage + semantic change

* Update test snapshots

* Remove grading summary from Grading page

* Move expensive util function out of component

* PR change: util function + shift dropdown back to grading page

* linting

* Actually pushes grading util migration

* useRef flag to disable re-initialization of callback prop in submissions table component

* Revert: Submissions from groups now default to all / my groups  based on admin role and valid group name

* Move dropdown options out of component

* Update whitespace

Minimizes unnecessary changes to the diff.

* Invert `limitGroup` back to `showAllGroups`

* Rename `showSubmissionOptions` back to `showOptions`

Facilitates merging the upstream later.

* Reorder lines

To facilitate merging later, as well as minimizing unnecessary changes
to the diff.

* Improve code readability

* Remove extra whitespace
* Use destructuring

* globalFilter removed from tanstack, search now mapped to mission title for backend querying

* update test types

* removed globalFilter in test

* lint

* Removed filtering support for individual grading stauses, filtering by grading status will be handled by dropdown only

* All frontend filtering removed.

* fix: Add notFullyGraded to query param for ungraded filter

* Debouncing added to search bar.

* Revert "Debouncing added to search bar."

This reverts commit d990a37fc9aed2fba8482138d56a93e3828aef66.

* Use lodash for debouncing over setTimeout

* Fix controlled search field regression

* Move pagination logic back inside table component

This reverts part of daee1398917382c2fef2fed84f2826584a120e21.

* Use `loadContentDispatch` prop for initial fetch

Fixes double API calls being dispatched on filter changes.

* Remove unnecessary `useRef` logic

* Remove old pagination logic

* Fix debounce not debouncing

* Remove unnecessary flex container

* Remove extra whitespace

* Add deletion TODO

* Improve type safety

* Improve request param generation

Removes unnecesary, slightly buggy logic

* Fix query param generation bugs

* Reorganize lines

To optimize diff readability.

Also updated the search placeholder value for UX.

* invert control flow of gradedOnly to correct state, return empty object to override default functionality

* invert control flow of gradedOnly to correct state

* Priority of params switched in RequestsSaga. This allows the ungraded options dropdown to override filters by progress.

* Fix page not resetting on dropdown option change

commitResults.messageTitle: Resolve loading indicator issues in grading table (#3064)
commitResults.messageBody:
* Use updated AGGrid API for async loading logo

Current implementation uses the outdated api.showLoadingOverlay(), which
causes issues in loading as the loading logo disappears even before
the data arrives. This commit uses the current method of using the
"loading" field in the AGGrid component, which solves the loading
mismatch issue.

* Block refreshing while loading

* Remove unnecesssary closing tag

* Update tooltip position for visibility

---------
